Hi, I'm Mengzhan (Jhan) Liufu!

I am an incoming PhD student at California Institute of Technology (Caltech).

I was a college student at the University of Chicago (UChicago). I got degrees in Computer Science, Physics and Economics. I was mentored by Professor Jai Yu, Professor Henry Hoffmann, Professor Bozhi Tian and other amazing scholars.

📄 CV ✉️ Email 💼 LinkedIn 💻 GitHub 🤗 HuggingFace
🪐Interests

I am experienced with machine learning, firmware development and closed-loop neuromodulation. I am currently interested in the following directions:

  • AI in the loop: multimodal machine learning for closed-loop applications (e.g VLA)
  • Adaptive ML: self-supervised learning, few-shot learning, DNN adaptation on-the-fly
  • AI to the brain: interaction with human nervous system through AI-empowered implants and wearables
🖥️Skills
  • Programming: Python, C/C++, Rust, SQL, R, Matlab
  • Machine learning: PyTorch, TensorFlow, scikit-learn, HuggingFace; Time-series modeling, self-supervised learning, transfer learning
  • Data analysis: Pandas, NumPy, SciPy, Matplotlib
  • Software tools: Git, Docker, Linux/Unix, Jupyter, VS Code
  • Firmware: FPGA, MSP430
